016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Map;
021import static java.util.Map.entry;
022
023/**
024 * Utility class to look up element names, masses, shortcut names, and ordering.
025 *
026 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
027 * @author Nils Hoffmann
028 */
029public final class Elements {
030
031    public static final double ELECTRON_REST_MASS = 0.00054857990946;
032
033    public static final Map<String, Element> ELEMENT_POSITIONS = Map.ofEntries(
034            entry("C", Element.C),
035            entry("D", Element.H2),
036            entry("H", Element.H),
037            entry("N", Element.N),
038            entry("O", Element.O),
039            entry("P", Element.P),
040            entry("P'", Element.P32),
041            entry("S", Element.S),
042            entry("F", Element.F),
043            entry("Cl", Element.Cl),
044            entry("Br", Element.Br),
045            entry("I", Element.I),
046            entry("As", Element.As),
047            entry("S'", Element.S34),
048            entry("S''", Element.S33),
049            entry("H'", Element.H2),
050            entry("C'", Element.C13),
051            entry("N'", Element.N15),
052            entry("O'", Element.O17),
053            entry("O''", Element.O18),
054            entry("2H", Element.H2),
055            entry("13C", Element.C13),
056            entry("15N", Element.N15),
057            entry("17O", Element.O17),
058            entry("18O", Element.O18),
059            entry("32P", Element.P32),
060            entry("34S", Element.S34),
061            entry("33S", Element.S33),
062            entry("H2", Element.H2),
063            entry("C13", Element.C13),
064            entry("N15", Element.N15),
065            entry("O17", Element.O17),
066            entry("O18", Element.O18),
067            entry("P32", Element.P32),
068            entry("S34", Element.S34),
069            entry("S33", Element.S33)
070    );
071
072    public static final Map<Element, Double> ELEMENT_MASSES = Map.ofEntries(
073            entry(Element.C, 12.0),
074            entry(Element.H, 1.007825035),
075            entry(Element.N, 14.0030740),
076            entry(Element.O, 15.99491463),
077            entry(Element.P, 30.973762),
078            entry(Element.S, 31.9720707),
079            entry(Element.H2, 2.014101779),
080            entry(Element.C13, 13.0033548378),
081            entry(Element.N15, 15.0001088984),
082            entry(Element.O17, 16.9991315),
083            entry(Element.O18, 17.9991604),
084            entry(Element.P32, 31.973907274),
085            entry(Element.S33, 32.97145876),
086            entry(Element.S34, 33.96786690),
087            entry(Element.F, 18.9984031),
088            entry(Element.Cl, 34.968853),
089            entry(Element.Br, 78.918327),
090            entry(Element.I, 126.904473),
091            entry(Element.As, 74.921595)
092    );
093
094    public static final Map<Element, String> ELEMENT_SHORTCUT = Map.ofEntries(
095            entry(Element.C, "C"),
096            entry(Element.D, "H'"),
097            entry(Element.H, "H"),
098            entry(Element.N, "N"),
099            entry(Element.O, "O"),
100            entry(Element.P, "P"),
101            entry(Element.S, "S"),
102            entry(Element.F, "F"),
103            entry(Element.Cl, "Cl"),
104            entry(Element.Br, "Br"),
105            entry(Element.I, "I"),
106            entry(Element.As, "As"),
107            entry(Element.H2, "H'"),
108            entry(Element.C13, "C'"),
109            entry(Element.N15, "N'"),
110            entry(Element.O17, "O'"),
111            entry(Element.O18, "O''"),
112            entry(Element.P32, "P'"),
113            entry(Element.S33, "S'"),
114            entry(Element.S34, "S''")
115    );
116
117    public static final Map<Element, String> HEAVY_SHORTCUT = Map.ofEntries(
118            entry(Element.C, "C"),
119            entry(Element.D, "H2"),
120            entry(Element.H, "H"),
121            entry(Element.N, "N"),
122            entry(Element.O, "O"),
123            entry(Element.P, "P"),
124            entry(Element.S, "S"),
125            entry(Element.F, "F"),
126            entry(Element.Cl, "Cl"),
127            entry(Element.Br, "Br"),
128            entry(Element.I, "I"),
129            entry(Element.As, "As"),
130            entry(Element.H2, "[2]H"),
131            entry(Element.C13, "[13]C"),
132            entry(Element.N15, "[15]N"),
133            entry(Element.O17, "[17]O"),
134            entry(Element.O18, "[18]O"),
135            entry(Element.P32, "[32]P"),
136            entry(Element.S33, "[33]S"),
137            entry(Element.S34, "[34]S")
138    );
139
140    public static final Map<Element, Element> HEAVY_TO_REGULAR = Map.ofEntries(
141            entry(Element.H2, Element.H),
142            entry(Element.D, Element.H),
143            entry(Element.C13, Element.C),
144            entry(Element.N15, Element.N),
145            entry(Element.O17, Element.O),
146            entry(Element.O18, Element.O),
147            entry(Element.P32, Element.P),
148            entry(Element.S33, Element.S),
149            entry(Element.S34, Element.S)
150    );
151    
152    
153    
154
155    public static final Map<String, Element> HEAVY_ELEMENT_TABLE = Map.ofEntries(
156            entry("[2]H", Element.H2),
157            entry("[13]C", Element.C13),
158            entry("[15]N", Element.N15),
159            entry("[17]O", Element.O17),
160            entry("[18]O", Element.O18),
161            entry("[32]P", Element.P32),
162            entry("[33]S", Element.S33),
163            entry("[34]S", Element.S34)
164    );
165    
166
167    public static final ArrayList<Element> ELEMENT_ORDER = new ArrayList<Element>(List.of(Element.C, Element.H, Element.As, Element.Br, Element.Cl, Element.F, Element.I, Element.N, Element.O, Element.P, Element.S, Element.H2, Element.C13, Element.N15, Element.O17, Element.O18, Element.P32, Element.S33, Element.S34));
168}
